Melf's First Staff is one of the Quarterstaff Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Melf's First Staff is an enchanted staff that once belonged to the famous wizard Melf, it accordingly allows the caster to cast Melf's Acid Arrow and adds a bonus to spell saves and spell attack rolls.
